title: Harris signs with Hollywood talent agency, joining Biden and Obama
shortDescription: Former Vice President Kamala Harris has signed with one of Hollywood's top talent firms, the Creative Artists Agency.

title: Civil rights groups sue Trump over anti-DEI orders
shortDescription: The National Urban League, National Fair Housing Alliance and AIDS Foundation of Chicago said Trump's orders posed an 'existential threat' to services

title: Trump's Army Corps seeks to fast-track 600 'emergency' projects
shortDescription: The fast-tracking of these projects could trigger legal fights, with environmental groups warning they are flouting federal laws.

title: Senate confirms Kelly Loeffler to head Small Business Administration
shortDescription: The Senate on Wednesday confirmed Kelly Loeffler, a former Georgia senator, to run the Small Business Administration.

title: Manipulated image shows Trump post about egg, gas prices | Fact check
shortDescription: There is no record of the post on Trump's Truth Social profile. There have also been no credible news reports covering the post as real.

title: Senate confirms Howard Lutnick for key role for Trump’s trade agenda
shortDescription: Billionaire Howard Lutnick confirmed as commerce secretary Tuesday night

title: Barron Trump 'oddity' flap: Top NYU Republican regrets quitting
shortDescription: Kaya Walker's remark drew swift backlash after it was shared by a popular conservative social media account.

title: Trump administration moves to nix NYC congestion pricing program
shortDescription: The Trump administration on Wednesday moved to end the polarizing New York City congestion pricing program.

title: Trump sounds off again on Ukraine's Zelenskyy in Truth Social post
shortDescription: After US and Russian officials meet on ending Russia-Ukraine war, Trump calls Volodymyr Zelenskyy a 'dictator' in a post on Truth Social.

title: US appeals court blocks Biden-era student debt relief plan
shortDescription: The SAVE program was designed to provide more generous terms than past income-based repayment plans.

title: Federal judge blocks Trump’s removal of Democrat agency chair
shortDescription: A federal judge ordered the Democratic chair of Merit Systems Protection Board, who was fired by President Donald Trump, be temporarily reinstated.

title: Americans’ approval of Congress is at its highest since May 2021
shortDescription: The latest Gallup poll, conducted among 1,004 adults, found that Americans’ approval of Congress’ job performance this month is at 29%.

title: Trump says Ukraine 'should have never started' war
shortDescription: President Donald Trump suggested Ukraine "should have never started" the war in Ukraine.

title: Zelenskyy claps back at Trump: 'Lives in this disinformation space'
shortDescription: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said that Trump is trapped in a Russian “disinformation" bubble and argued Ukraine is not for sale.

title: President Trump and Elon Musk joint interview
shortDescription: Elon Musk described the federal workforce as an "unelected bureaucracy" during the interview on Fox News Channel.

title: Putin-Trump meeting possible this month, Kremlin says
shortDescription: Trump said Tuesday he would probably meet Putin this month and dismissed Ukraine's concern about being left out of U.S.-Russian talks in Saudi Arabia.
